comment: /**  * Handle {@literal INT} signals by calling the specified {@link Runnable}.  * @param runnable the runnable to call on SIGINT.  */
code: /**  * Handle {@literal INT} signals by calling the specified {@link Runnable}.  * @param runnable the runnable to call on SIGINT.  */ public static void attachSignalHandler(Runnable runnable) {     Signal.handle(SIG_INT, (signal) -> runnable.run()). }
